sn4.25:1.1: Atha kho maro papima bhagavato santike ima nibbejaniya gathayo abhasitva tamha thana apakkamma bhagavato avidure pathaviyam pallankena nisidi tunhibhuto mankubhuto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhayanto appatibhano katthena bhumim vilikhanto.
sn4.25:1.2: Atha kho tanha ca arati ca raga ca maradhitaro yena maro papima tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva maram papimantam gathaya ajjhabhasimsu:
sn4.25:4.1: Atha kho tanha ca arati ca raga ca maradhitaro yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn4.25:4.3: Atha kho bhagava na manasakasi, yatha tam anuttare upadhisankhaye vimutto.
sn4.25:5.1: Atha kho tanha ca arati ca raga ca maradhitaro ekamantam apakkamma evam samacintesum:
sn4.25:5.3: Yannuna mayam ekasatam ekasatam kumarivannasatam abhinimmineyyama”ti.
sn4.25:5.4: Atha kho tanha ca arati ca raga ca maradhitaro ekasatam ekasatam kumarivannasatam abhinimminitva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn4.25:5.6: Tampi bhagava na manasakasi, yatha tam anuttare upadhisankhaye vimutto.
sn4.25:6.1: Atha kho tanha ca arati ca raga ca maradhitaro ekamantam apakkamma evam samacintesum:
sn4.25:6.3: Yannuna mayam ekasatam ekasatam avijatavannasatam abhinimmineyyama”ti.
sn4.25:6.4: Atha kho tanha ca arati ca raga ca maradhitaro ekasatam ekasatam avijatavannasatam abhinimminitva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn4.25:6.6: Tampi bhagava na manasakasi, yatha tam anuttare upadhisankhaye vimutto.
sn4.25:7.2: yannuna mayam ekasatam ekasatam sakim vijatavannasatam abhinimmineyyamati.
sn4.25:7.4: sakim vijatavannasatam abhinimminitva yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn4.25:7.6: Tampi bhagava na manasakasi, yatha tam anuttare upadhisankhaye vimutto.
sn4.25:8.2: yannuna mayam ekasatam ekasatam duvijatavannasatam abhinimmineyyamati.
sn4.25:9.6: Atha kho tanha ca arati ca raga ca maradhitaro ekamantam apakkamma etadavocum:
sn4.25:11.1: Yanhi mayam samanam va brahmanam va avitaragam imina upakkamena upakkameyyama hadayam vassa phaleyya, unham lohitam va mukhato uggaccheyya, ummadam va papuneyya cittakkhepam va.
sn4.25:11.2: Seyyatha va pana nalo harito luto ussussati visussati milayati;
sn4.25:12.1: Atha kho tanha ca arati ca raga ca maradhitaro yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva ekamantam atthamsu.
sn4.25:12.2: Ekamantam thita kho tanha maradhita bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn4.25:15.1: Atha kho arati maradhita bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn4.25:17.4: Na kuppati na sarati na thino.
sn4.25:19.1: Atha kho raga maradhita bhagavato santike gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn4.25:22.1: Atha kho tanha ca arati ca raga ca maradhitaro yena maro papima tenupasankamimsu.
sn4.25:22.2: Addasa kho maro papima tanhanca aratinca raganca maradhitaro duratova agacchantiyo.
